Edgar Kaup

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Edgar L. Runyon
  3. Location of Family: David City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: David City, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 9
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: male
  9. Notes: Foster family listed as "temporary;" was later given a permanent home "elsewhere."
  10. Source: OTR, 322; People's Banner (David City, NE), 23 November 1916; David City Banner Press, 5 February 1981.
